dialogue.speaker: Lulù
text: you came all this way down here?
you shouldn’t have. i could’ve handled this myself.

dialogue.speaker: Pippi
text: i don’t doubt it at all.
i just missed you, i wanted to see you.

dialogue.speaker: Lulù
text: why do you still hold on to that?
there are so many things out there, so many people.
you’re missing out on a lot

dialogue.speaker: Pippi
text: but i don't want any of that
i don’t miss the feeling, i miss you
how close you were, and what you used to think of me.

dialogue.speaker: Lulù
text: i don’t know what to say.
i still care about you, i’m not disappearing.
but this is just how life moves. you can’t fight that.

dialogue.speaker: Pippi
text: i know, and i’m not trying to change anything.
i just wish i was still worth your desire.
i’m trying to be enough again.
I just wish you felt the same, regardless
if i have to work to deserve it, i’m fine with that.
